snippet: The group says the system is rife with arbitrary arrests, torture and unfair trials, but Hamas officials challenged Human Rights Watch’s work.
abstract: Human Rights Watch accuses Hamas of running a criminal justice system rife with arbitrary arrests, torture and unfair trials; Hamas officials challenge the methodology of group’s research.
lead_paragraph: The group says the system is rife with arbitrary arrests, torture and unfair trials, but Hamas officials challenged Human Rights Watch’s work.

headline.seo: Human Rights Watch Report Critical of Hamas Justice System in Gaza
headline.main: Rights Group Criticizes Hamas-Run Justice System in Gaza
headline.print_headline: Rights Group Criticizes Hamas-Run Justice System in Gaza

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
